Others: Jimmy Butler said he probably cannot find on-court joy in Miami.
Butler scored exactly nine points and played zero seconds in the fourth quarter for the second consecutive game.
Butler has not reached double figures in scoring in three consecutive games, the first time that’s happened since November 2013.
Butler has been held to 10 points or less six times already this season.
Butler has a $52 million player option for next season or could leave Miami in free agency this summer.
Miami Heat coach Erik Spoelstra believes Butler’s performance issues are partly due to his recent illness.
